DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-lable , non-comparative , prospective , phase Ⅱ efficacy safety study . Eligible patient enrol single group . The investigator propose determine efficacy safety low-dose metronomic chemotherapy Etoposide/Capecitabine Patients Metastatic Breast Cancer Previously Treated Anthracyclines and/or Taxanes .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase Ⅱ Study All-Oral Combination Low-dose Etoposide/Capecitabine Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer Previously Treated With Anthracyclines and/or Taxanes
DOC.criteria: female patient 18 65 year old patient metastatic breast cancer previousely treat A/T able willing give consent participate study pregnant lactating female tumor history instable complication ( e.g. , myocardial infarction within 6 month , arrhythmia , unstable diabetes , hypercalcemia ) uncontrolled infection concurrent disease condition would make patient inappropriate study participation resist participate study
